page.title: 08FURNITURE MAKER, BARNSTAPLE.
page.content: {Shapland and Petters}is an established furniture making factory in Barnstaple which now solely concentrates on making doors. It was built in 1854 and rebuilt in 1889 after being burnt down.It was founded by{Henry Shapland {and Henry Petter.}About 650 people work there.It now makes very high quality doors such as those found in hospitals ,theatres and concert halls.They have made doors exclusively for 12 years,before that they made very good furniture.They concentrate on doors because there is a good market for them.They have never had a fire in the present factory.They export many of their products and will export to any country in the world.Some of their customers are very important people whose identity is kept secret by the company.
